import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { BrowserRouter, Route, Routes } from "react-router-dom"; import Login from '../login/Login' import Dashboard from '../dashboard/Dashboard' import './cadastro.css' import imgbackground from './background.jpg' import imglogo from './logoneg.svg' export default function Cadastro(){ const [user, setUser] = useState({ firstname: '', lastname: '', birthdate: '', country: '', city: '', email: '', password: '' }); const handleChange = e => { const { name, value } = e.target; setUser(prevState => ({ ...prevState, [name]: value })); }; function validate(){ localStorage.setItem("user",JSON.stringify(user)); console.log(localStorage.getItem("user")) } return (
